description:
A new version of openSUSE Leap is now available, as the openSUSE Project has announced the release of openSUSE Leap 15.6. If you are a user who prefers a well-tested operating system with long-term consistency and a lower frequency of upgrades, then openSUSE Leap may be worth a look.

The post openSUSE Leap 15.6 Released, Here’s What You Need to Know appeared first on Linux Today.
title: openSUSE Leap 15.6 Released, Here’s What You Need to Know
